result.reason: The application hangs likely due to blocking synchronous calls on the UI thread during credential retrieval (ExternalConnectors) or reconnection attempts (PortScanner). 'Connect' and 'Initialize' methods in protocols are synchronous but perform network I/O.
result.approach: Refactor ProtocolBase.Connect to be asynchronous (ConnectAsync). Update ConnectionInitiator to await the connection process. Ensure ExternalCredentialProvider lookups and PortScanner checks are performed asynchronously without blocking the UI thread.
